CustomField.description: This allows a appointment type to only be shown on UST Event Instances with matching titles. Select one instance with the desired title (it doesn't matter which one) and all instance with that same title will have this appointment. All non-matching titles will NOT contain this appointment. This is an entirely optional setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Appointment type to only be shown on UST Event Instances with matching titles to instance selected here. All other instance with non-matching titles will not include this appointment.
CustomField.label: Restrict To Instance Title
